h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice
content: With a massive blast, the ground will explode in color, dealing a ton of damage if you aren't grounded at the top of your staff, and then the sphere will return to the construct body.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice'.
The content is as follows:
With a massive blast, the ground will explode in color, dealing a ton of damage if you aren't grounded at the top of your staff, and then the sphere will return to the construct body.
